message.content:
{
  "structured": {
    "name": "Maha Ahmed A.Salam",
    "contact": {
      "email": "maha83607@gmail.com",
      "phone": "01064036905",
      "linkedin": null,
      "github": null,
      "portfolio": null
    },
    "location": {
      "city": "Giza",
      "country": "Egypt"
    },
    "current_title": "Sales & Operation Specialist",
    "total_experience_years": null,
    "education": [
      {
        "degree": "Faculty of Commerce",
        "institution": "Ain Shams University",
        "year": 2021
      }
    ],
    "experience": [
      {
        "title": "Sales Specialist",
        "company": "El Gohary Co. for Metal Packages",
        "start_year": 2024,
        "end_year": "Present",
        "highlights": [
          "Acted as the primary point of contact for client inquiries and service requests, delivering prompt support and solutions tailored to customer needs.",
          "Conducted product and service presentations, addressing client concerns and tailoring solutions to match customer requirements.",
          "Managed the complete sales cycle from initial engagement to deal closure, including price negotiation, contract follow-up, and post-sale support.",
          "Maintained accurate sales records and updated CRM systems to track leads, follow-ups, and sales performance.",
          "Identified upselling and cross-selling opportunities through understanding of client needs and product capabilities."
        ]
      },
      {
        "title": "HR Coordinator",
        "company": "El Gohary Co. for Metal Packages",
        "start_year": 2021,
        "end_year": 2022,
        "highlights": [
          "Executed the full monthly payroll cycle including calculation and verification of salaries, overtime, allowances, deductions, and final settlements.",
          "Maintained employee records including contracts, salary revisions, leaves, and disciplinary actions in alignment with company policies and labor law requirements."
        ]
      },
      {
        "title": "Accountant and Purchase Specialist",
        "company": "El Gohary Co. for Metal Packages",
        "start_year": 2021,
        "end_year": 2021,
        "highlights": [
          "Prepared and submitted electronic invoices (e-invoices) through the Egyptian Tax Authority portal to ensure compliance with tax laws and deadlines.",
          "Maintained financial records, logging daily revenue and expenses in treasury ledgers.",
          "Supported generating internal reports and expense analyses for management review.",
          "Ensured documentation and archiving of financial transactions, receipts, and contracts for audits.",
          "Supported purchase requests by sourcing and negotiating with suppliers to obtain cost-effective quotations while ensuring quality and delivery time.",
          "Managed vendor communications, tracked purchase orders and follow-ups, maintained supplier database, and supported long-term supplier relationships."
        ]
      },
      {
        "title": "Sales Specialist",
        "company": "Coldwell Banker",
        "start_year": 2021,
        "end_year": 2021,
        "highlights": [
          "Assisted in showcasing and promoting properties to potential buyers or renters and responded to client inquiries.",
          "Built and maintained relationships with clients to understand needs and preferences.",
          "Collaborated with senior agents to learn sales techniques and industry best practices.",
          "Provided support during negotiation phases with customers.",
          "Maintained records of property listings, client interactions, and sales activities."
        ]
      },
      {
        "title": "Customer Service (Internship)",
        "company": "Bank Misr",
        "start_year": 2019,
        "end_year": 2020,
        "highlights": [
          "Answered questions about account types and banking products.",
          "Checked status of customer accounts and tracked checks and payments; reviewed and explained account charges.",
          "Assisted with personal data changes."
        ]
      },
      {
        "title": "Internship",
        "company": "EGAS OIL COMPANY",
        "start_year": 2019,
        "end_year": 2020,
        "highlights": [
          "Assisted in basic financial data entry and documentation.",
          "Supported administrative tasks such as filing, organizing documents, and handling correspondence."
        ]
      }
    ],
    "skills": [
      "Negotiation",
      "Interpersonal skills",
      "Multitasking",
      "Customer-Oriented Mindset",
      "Communication skills",
      "Critical thinking",
      "Time management",
      "Adaptability"
    ],
    "tools": [
      "CRM"
    ],
    "certifications": [],
    "languages": [],
    "projects": []
  },
  "analysis": {
    "score": 18,
    "score_breakdown": {
      "role_fit_and_core_skills": 0,
      "experience_impact": 4,
      "performance_productivity": 3,
      "retention_engagement_indicators": 1,
      "leadership_collaboration": 4,
      "education_certifications": 6,
      "projects_initiative": 0
    },
    "seniorityLevel": "entry_level",
    "recommendation": "not_recommended",
    "insights": {
      "strengths": [
        "Demonstrated communication, customer-facing experience, and negotiation through multiple sales and service roles",
        "Experience managing operationally sensitive processes (e.g., payroll cycle, records maintenance, compliance documentation)",
        "Strong academic performance (Excellent with honor degree)"
      ],
      "weaknesses": [
        "No evidence of required full stack development skills (React, Next, Nest, TypeScript, JavaScript, Node.js, Express, MERN/PERN, SQL/NoSQL)",
        "No software engineering experience or production web application delivery mentioned",
        "No stated Arabic language proficiency (a requirement for the role)",
        "Location preference mismatch (candidate located in Egypt; role prefers England/Europe)"
      ]
    }
  },
  "ai_insights": {
    "matched_job_titles": [],
    "ai_thought": "The resume describes sales, HR, accounting, procurement, and customer service experience with no stated software development background or the required full-stack technologies. Also missing explicit Arabic language confirmation and UK/EU location alignment.",
    "suggested_next_roles": [
      "Sales Specialist",
      "Sales Operations Specialist",
      "HR Coordinator",
      "Procurement Specialist",
      "Customer Service Representative",
      "Accounts Payable/Receivable Specialist"
    ]
  }
}
